ARABIC: وَيُكَلِّمُ ٱلنَّاسَ فِى ٱلْمَهْدِ وَكَهْلًا وَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When the angels said, 'Maryam, Allah gives you good news of a Word from Him. His name is the
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who will speak to the people when in the cradle and when in the prime of life, and will be among the upright and doers of good."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And he shall speak to men in the cradle and also later when he grows to maturity and shall indeed be among the righteous.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He will speak to the people while in his cradle and preach to them when he will be a man. He will be one of the righteous ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “He will speak to people while he is in the cradle and in his adulthood, and will be of the devoted ones.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He will speak to the people, in the cradle and in manhood, and he will be one of the righteous."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And he shall speak to the people when in the cradle and when of old age, and (he shall be) one of the good ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He shall speak to men in the cradle, and of age, and righteous he shall be.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He will speak unto mankind in his cradle and in his manhood, and he is of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And he shall speak to men in his cradle, and as a grown man, and shall be one of the righteous."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And he shall speak unto mankind from the cradle and in maturity; and be one of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will speak to the people in the cradle and in adulthood, and will be one of the righteous.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He shall speak to the people in childhood and in maturity. And he shall be (of the company) of the righteous."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He will speak to the people in the cradle and in manhood, and he will be one of the righteous."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He shall speak to people in his cradle and when he is aged, and shall be among the righteous'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will speak to the people from the crib, and in adulthood, and will be one of the righteous.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He will speak to the people in the cradle and in maturity and will be of the righteous."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:46]   He shall speak to mankind in the cradle, that is to say, as a child before the age of speech, and in his manhood, and he is of the righteous’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He will speak unto mankind in his cradle) in the lap of his mother, saying: I am the servant of Allah and His Messiah (and in his manhood) after he reaches 30 years old, saying that he is a prophet, (and he is of the righteous) of the messengers.
